snippet: The University of Hawaii said that a third observatory would be taken from Mauna Kea, fulfilling the governor’s request to reduce the number of telescopes from a mountain many consider sacred.
abstract: University of Hawaii says it will remove third observatory from Mauna Kea in response to requirement to remove 25 percent of telescopes from summit before new Thirty Meter Telescope can be completed; decision comes in response to complaints from Native Hawaiians, who consider mountain sacred.
lead_paragraph: The University of Hawaii said that a third observatory would be taken from Mauna Kea, fulfilling the governor’s request to reduce the number of telescopes from a mountain many consider sacred.

headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Third Observatory to Be Shut on Mauna Kea
headline.main: Hawaii: Third Observatory to Be Shut on Mauna Kea
